mapper.insert: insert into my_qna(my_qna_no, member_id, my_qna_category, title, writer, content, regdate) values(#{my_qna_no},#{member.member_id},#{my_qna_category},#{title},#{writer}, #{content}, #{regdate})
mapper.update: update my_qna(my_qna_category, title, content) where my_qna_no=#{My_qna_no}
